text: Yã kũ waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni! Idan an ce muka, *"Ku yalwatã a cikin majalisai," to, ku yalwatã, sai Allah Ya yalwatã muku, kuma idan an ce muku, "Ku tãshi" to, ku tãshi. Allah nã ɗaukaka waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni daga cikinku da waɗanda aka bai wa ilim wasu darajõji mãsu yawa, kuma, Allah Mai ƙididdigewa ne ga dukan kõme
